steps.title: Datalake
steps.description: If you see `Datalake Name` below, then you already have a datalake. There can only be one Datalake per environment. Your datalake consists of `S3 buckets`, `roles`, `policies`, `S3 event notifications` and `lambda functions` for safely storing data and managing various data pipelines. Datalake will be automatically created when you configure any data pipeline or analytics jobs.
